tool_description: Text to Speech Urdu specially designed for Urdu language.
name: Text to Speech Urdu
title: Text to Speech Urdu

api_list.name: Generate Audio
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to generate audio request from the provided text data....
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-urdu2.p.rapidapi.com/api/texttospeech/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-urdu2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-urdu2.p.rapidapi.com/api/texttospeech/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-urdu2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
